title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 573.2 - Projects involving more than one land use area
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 573.2 - Projects involving more than one land use area

State Regulations

If a new land use or development or subdivision of land
will be located in more than one land use area, determination of agency review
jurisdiction shall be based upon the portion of the new land use or development
or subdivision of land proposed for each land use area
involved. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
573.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
